OOC since she never got her samples I'll pick Lady Hawk up from here.


BIC Lady Hawk grew tired of waiting, If Zardus had lied about providing her
samples for her experiments she decided to provide her own. She searched
through her DNA samples and decided to use Scorpion and Snake DNA fused with
theAlien DNA Zardus had provided. A small pool of DNA sat before her,
already beginning to grow. Much like Doctor Frankenstein she was creating a
monster and didn't even know it.
